title: NIH Human Virome Program Timeline and Milestones
description: Key events and milestones in the NIH Human Virome Program from planning through completion.

milestones.milestone: Public Workshop on Human Virome Concept
milestones.description: Initial public workshop to discuss the concept and scope of the Human Virome Program.
Presentation to the Division of Program Coordination, Planning, and Strategic Initiatives Council of Councils.
Publication of funding opportunity announcements for the HVP program.
Webinar for potential applicants to learn about the program and application process.
Award of major center grants to establish the HVP research infrastructure.
Initial meeting of all HVP investigators, scheduled 3 months after awards.
Initial phase focused on protocol standardization and establishment of common methods across centers.
Development of research infrastructure, tools, and methods across centers.
Primary phase of data collection and generation across all HVP projects.
Comprehensive analysis and synthesis of collected data across centers.
Completion of the first phase of the HVP program.
